conversation.message_text: DreamCloud: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel. Phone support: (833) 237-3269.
DreamCloud: You're in (& your deal is here)!

DreamCloud: Upgrade your old mattress for less. Save up to 60% + FREE bedding bundle worth $599. 

Claim your savings:
dreamcloud.attn.tv/aqhH_ThUNFxN .

DreamCloud: Hello, this is Sam! We noticed you left the Premier Adjustable Bed Frame in your cart! You can save up to 60%. Complete your purchase now to lock in these savings: dreamcloud.attn.tv/alw5x8SccImF 

If you have questions before you check out, text me back!
.
Hi Sam, I did not complete the order, because every time I click on size king for the adjustable base, it shows up in the cart as twin xl.  Can you help me

DreamCloud: I'm really sorry for the confusion, and I completely understand why seeing Twin XL in the cart would be concerning when you selected King. I'm here to help! The Adjustable Base in King Size actually contains two Twin XL bases that are locked and synced together. They function as a single King base and are controlled by one remote. So even though the cart shows Twin XL, this is completely normal and the base will give you a full King setup as expected.

SERVICE

Steve Madden: Good day and sorry for the slow reply. I am sorry to hear that the shoes arrived defective! This is not the experience we want for our customers! If you receive damaged or defective items, please notify us immediately via email, live chat or call 1-888-SMADDEN (888 762-3336) and we will send you a return label. As soon as the item is sent back a full refund will be issued.

If you prefer, you may return the item to a Steve Madden store (only stores in the USA excluding Colorado, Utah and Savannah, GA locations). Take the merchandise in its original packaging to the store. Make sure you have the order number or the email confirmation sent after an order is placed.

Good Day.
We don't want a refund. We would like to exchange them.
How can we make that happen?

Template used: "Customer support"; last updated: 2022-04-20 19:13:58.201

Steve Madden: I'm really sorry for the frustration this has caused! We do not do exchanges. The best way to handle this is to email us directly at info@stevemaddendirect.com, live chat with one of our agents via the website or give us a call at 1-888-762-3336. Our team is happy to help!
